articles.description: Ireland continue their winning start to the World Cup with a bonus-point victory over Tonga on a landmark night for Johnny Sexton in Nantes.
articles.title: Sexton breaks record as eight-try Ireland beat Tonga

articles.description: A much-changed Wales struggle to a bonus-point World Cup victory over impressive Portugal in Nice.
articles.title: Wales struggle to beat impressive Portugal

articles.description: Brighton cruised past Manchester United at Old Trafford to hand the Reds their third defeat of the season
articles.title: Brighton up to third with 3-1 win over Man Utd

articles.description: Ferrari's Carlos Sainz edges out George Russell's Mercedes for pole position as Max Verstappen qualifies 11th at the Singapore Grand Prix.
articles.title: Sainz on Singapore pole as angry Verstappen struggles

articles.description: Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Danny Murphy discuss how Brighton were able to exploit Manchester United's change in formation during their 3-1 win at Old Trafford.
articles.title: How Brighton picked apart new-look Man Utd - analysis

articles.description: Harry Swindells hits an unbeaten century before Leicestershire beat Hampshire off the last ball to win the One-Day Cup at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: Foxes beat Hants to win cup in last-ball thriller

articles.description: Champions Barcelona open up a one-point lead over Real Madrid thanks to a 5-0 win over Real Betis at the Nou Camp.
articles.title: Barcelona crush Betis to go top

articles.description: Celtic move two points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership after eventually overwhelming stubborn visitors Dundee.
articles.title: Leaders Celtic ease to victory over stubborn Dundee

articles.description: World champion Luca Brecel beats Neil Robertson 10-7 to set up a Shanghai Masters final against Ronnie O'Sullivan.
articles.title: Brecel sets up O'Sullivan final in Shanghai

articles.description: Christian Coleman and Shericka Jackson upset the reigning 100m world champions to become this year's Diamond League trophy winners.
articles.title: Coleman & Jackson win titles in Diamond League upsets
